entry.title: Arab leaders must walk the k on Palestine
entry.paragraph: Meek words of con­dem­na­tion will not stop the Is­raeli geno­cide of Pales­tini­ans in Gaza.
entry.author: Mar­wan Bishara

entry.title: Israel is forcibly disappearing Gaza
entry.paragraph: Cut­ting off the Pales­tini­ans of Gaza from the rest of the world is a mod­ern twist on the crime of forced dis­ap­pear­ances.
entry.author: Belén Fer­nán­dez

entry.title: In dehumanising the Palestinians, Biden has surpassed Trump
entry.paragraph: The US pres­i­dent’s sup­port for geno­cide in Gaza is hard­ly sur­pris­ing giv­en his coun­try’s set­tler-colo­nial past.
entry.author: Haidar Eid

entry.title: The war in Sudan is a consequence of a derailed transition
entry.paragraph: Su­dan’s tran­si­tion should have fo­cused on sta­bil­is­ing the econ­o­my and con­ven­ing elec­tions, not dis­man­tling a regime.
entry.author: Dird­eiry M Ahmed

entry.title: Hamass attack on Israel has changed the Middle East
entry.paragraph: The US re­gion­al strat­e­gy lays in sham­bles, as its al­lies face pres­sure and its foes seek to take ad­van­tage.
entry.author: Mar­wan Ka­bal­an

entry.title: Why are Palestinians supposed to take it again and again?
entry.paragraph: The West is try­ing not only to sti­fle but to crim­i­nalise all Pales­tin­ian dis­sent.
entry.author: An­drew Mitro­vi­ca

entry.title: Fanatics vs generals: The strange Israeli rift over Gaza
entry.paragraph: The di­vi­sions in the war cab­i­net will have far reach­ing con­se­quences for Is­rael, but lit­tle im­pact on the fate of Gaza.
entry.author: Mar­wan Bishara

entry.title: The ICC should urgently investigate what happened at al-Ahli Arab Hospital
entry.paragraph: Com­pet­ing al­le­ga­tions over the source of the ex­plo­sion at the al-Ahli Arab Hos­pi­tal shows ex­act­ly why the ICC must act.
entry.author: Mark Ker­sten

entry.title: Guterres, Gaza and the consequences of countering Israelspeak
entry.paragraph: As we’ve just seen with the UN chief, not even the slight­est di­ver­sion from Is­rael’s counter-re­al­i­ty is per­mis­si­ble.
entry.author: Belén Fer­nán­dez

entry.title: Western media failures say more about the West than Gaza
entry.paragraph: West­ern me­dia cov­er­age of the war re­flects the cul­tur­al per­cep­tion that Pales­tin­ian and Is­raeli lives are not equal.
entry.author: Patrick Gath­ara

entry.title: Democracy in Africa is not a Western imposition
entry.paragraph: The likes of Kagame and Doum­bouya are not be­ing hon­est – Africans love democ­ra­cy and want to see it work.
entry.author: Tafi Mha­ka

entry.title: Israels war of self-deceit
entry.paragraph: When has killing more Pales­tini­ans ever re­sult­ed in bet­ter se­cu­ri­ty for the Is­raeli so­ci­ety?
entry.author: Mar­wan Bishara

entry.title: Pakistan must not collectively punish Afghan refugees
entry.paragraph: Or­di­nary Afghans are not re­spon­si­ble for the per­ceived faults of a gov­ern­ment they did not elect.
entry.author: Obaidul­lah Ba­heer

entry.title: Western feminism and its blind spots in the Middle East
entry.paragraph: The mes­sage lead­ing West­ern fem­i­nists are send­ing to Pales­tin­ian women is clear: your suf­fer­ing does not mat­ter.
entry.author: Maryam Al­dos­sari
